title: Update README.md

title: Add project reference to the ABS library.
message:
Add project reference to the ABS library. 

This is to hint the Eclipse builder to build the ABS library before the
EclipseUITips project and avoid any intermediate build error markers.

title: Fix typo in the text of guideline 10.3.

title: First working version.
message:
First working version. 

All guidelines are imported. 
Notification is triggered 15 seconds after starting the application,
and every 25 minutes after that. 

Major leftovers:
* AlarmClock usage still needs to be finer tuning. 
* Welcome activity must show some introductory info.
